M & R - The Best Global Procurement Network where we deal with all kinds of International Purchasing and Materials Procurements needs. With over 31 years of global presence, we’ve developed undeniable unique propositions that our clients can get benefit from.
Our In-House Procurement specialists are professional in their approach and get things done with smooth workflows giving no stress to our clients.
Hassle-free procurement is ensured by remarkable relationship development and work done through teams who are dedicated to their domain-related tasks.
No low-quality product and supplies are dealt with by M & R so you can always rely on our Quality Assurance team and vendors are procured after legal paperwork.

div.h6: Unmatched price due to extensive network of Suppliers and Clients.

div.p: Our clients always love the pricing quotations we are able to create for them because of stellar relationship with vendors.

div.h6: Ease of work with Single Vendor Contact concept

div.p: M & R is to provide complete Vending Solutions your business needs. You don't need to experience hassle while dealing with various entities.
You can set your own preferred payment terms while working with M & R. We will be responsible to deal with the third party vendors

ul.li: You have only one contact that takes care of all agreements, negotiations and transactions on your behalf. You save money and an enormous amount of time.

You benefit directly from our expertise of 31 years’ experience- a global network, and established workflows, guaranteeing maximum synergies, minimum costs, the fastest possible delivery, and optimal results.
You get the assurance and certainty that your delivery will arrive on time with the most suitable terms and conditions.
Uncomplicated, low-cost, and flexible payment and billing methods which allows you all the flexibility you need.
